panels.description: Note that replica_port can change if replicas ever detach and re-attach
panels.title: Replication Lag

targets.expr: ccp_stat_database_blks_hit{cluster="[[pgcluster]]", job=~"[[pgnodes]]", dbname=~"[[pgdatabase]]"}  / ( ccp_stat_database_blks_hit{cluster="[[pgcluster]]", job=~"[[pgnodes]]", dbname=~"[[pgdatabase]]"} + ccp_stat_database_blks_read{cluster="[[pgcluster]]", job=~"[[pgnodes]]", dbname=~"[[pgdatabase]]"}) * 100
